name: Cloud Run continuous Deployment with GitHubActions
shortDescription:
Cloud Run continuous Deployment with GitHubActions.
Containerise your app using Docker push the code to GitHub trigger a build with cloud build and push the image to GCR and deploy the app to CloudRun
longDescription:
Cloud Run continuous Deployment with GitHubActions.
Containerise your app using Docker push the code to GitHub trigger a build with cloud build and push the image to GCR and deploy the app to CloudRun
